channel.title: Steam Gift that I can no longer see
channel.description:
So I recently bought Killing Floor for a friend as a gift. However, after sending it to him, he hasn't recieved anything , and I cannot see anywhere in my steam account that says it's pending or whatnot. I checked my bank account, and it says I bought it. I have email confirmation that I bought it. So any ideas om why it isn't...existing?
EDIT:[b][COLOR='Red']Problems resolved[/b], though I'm not sure how or why this happened. This thread can be closed now haha
